listing.title: Alps Mountaineering Zephyr 2 Person Backpacking Tent
listing.content: Alps Mountaineering Zephyr 2 Person Backpacking Tent. Used EXC! condition! Great for hiking, camping, hunters, motorcycle trips, bikers or just back yard sleeping! Sealed seams and urethane-coated fly and floor, this is a lightweight three-season tent. Sets up quickly, with 2.5 alloy aluminum poles and a simple clip system. Mesh walls provide excellent ventilation. Vestibules on both sides. Fly buckles securely to the tent. Has stakes and guys for stability. Mesh storage pocket and small "gear loft".•Free-standing 2- 7000 Series aluminum poles (has one 2 piece pole across top for stability)•Polyester fly resists UV damage and stays taut•Factory sealed fly and floor seams give best weather protection•2 doors and 2 vestibules - great ventilation with entire mesh walls and adjustable fly vent•Easy assembly with pole clips that quickly snap over the tent poles•75d 185t taffeta floor with 2000mm coating•Base size: 4 ft 10 in x 7 ft 4 in•Center height: 3 ft 2 in•Vestibule depth: 28 in•Tent area: 31 sq ft•Vestibule area: 8.5 sq ft•Total weight: 4 lbs 12 oz•Packed size: 6 x 18 inIf interested in anything call, text or email me back (text is Best). show contact info Thanks, Mike http://cosprings.craigslist.org/spo/5758722499.html

listing.title: Arcteryx Altra 62 Backpacking Pack - New with Tags

listing.title: Deuter ACT LITE 65+10 BackPack Backpacking pack Latest model
listing.content: Superlight, and one of the most comfortable backpacking packs REI sells. Just ask them, seriously :)One size adjusts for all, so no need to worry about S, M, L size this will adjust to fit all. Also fits both men and women!Deuter Aircontact SystemLid pocket, internal valuables pocket, zippered hip belt pocketHydration system compatibleVolume: 65L + 10LWeight: 4 lb 6ozThese athletic, sleek packs remain true to their lightweight credentials: with their minimal weight and purist, technical look, the ACT Lite models are good-looking, light, yet reliable companions on any tour. Twin lid buckles and a stretch front compartment provide more options to store all your kit. Front gear loops also mean you can easily attach a sleeping mat to the outside. The slimline body of the pack and the compact hip belt allow plenty of freedom of movement when trekking or mountaineering. Stretch front compartmentCompact multi-layer hip belt construction with 'pull-forward' function makes the hip belt easy to fasten, even with even heavy loadsContoured shoulder straps with soft edgesLightweight multi-chamber aluminium X-frameTop lid pocket with valuables pocketTop gear loops on Lid compartmentSeparate bottom compartmentInner separator pocketMesh side pocketsIce axe loopsStretch side pocketsCompression and stabiliser strapsDouble-layered basesimilar: osprey atmos, aether, aura, 65, 50 AG, Ariel, http://sfbay.craigslist.org/eby/spo/5765249719.html

listing.title: Therm-A-Rest Lux Large Backpacking Camping Pad Cascade Designs
listing.content: I have a Thermarest self-inflating camp pad that I don't use anymore. This is the "Lux Large", full length 76" long, 25" wide, 2" thick. This was the top-line model, the thickest and most comfortable, has the flannel-like material on the sleeping side that is very soft and you don't slip off of it. No leaks at all. I checked it out in the bathtub, holds air just fine with no leaks. Includes the original carry sack...............$50, firm................. therm-a-rest, north face, marmot, camprest, climbing, backpacking, backpack, reihttp://sfbay.craigslist.org/nby/spo/5761678215.html

Lime color, with removable day pack. listing.title: Patagonia Ultralight Down Jacket Mens XL
listing.content: For sale is a Patagonia Ultralight down jacket in Underwater Blue color This is a perfect jacket for Northern California climate...super light at only 19 oz yet warm enough to take to the snow. I just have two and I prefer the other color. There are no rips, frays, stains or smells (smoke free home). . This is the newer updated version of the jacket and it is barely worn.
